paper_abstract: Grouping of gene expression patterns across biological experiments, treatments and time-series data is performed in q-intervals of measurements using phase-shifted analysis of gene expression (PAGE); a Java-based tool to find clusters of genes that share trends of expression profiles within the dataset. The patterns and genes within q-Clusters are visualized in trend plots and compared to determine biological relevance from the gene annotations.
paper_title: PAGE: phase-shifted analysis of gene expression
